name: Flying Mary
desc:
2 Zombie monsters
You can target 1 Level 5 or higher Zombie monster in your GY or banishment; place this card face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as a Continuous Spell, and if you do, Special Summon that monster. While this card is a Continuous Spell: You can target 1 Level 5 or higher Zombie monster you control; destroy 1 monster your opponent controls with an equal or lower ATK. You can only use each effect of "Flying Mary" once per turn.
